Sentencas: A new cathode ink for a solid oxide fuel cell has been developed (patent pending: UK Patent Application Number 1107672,6).
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation

Sentencas: A novel, water-based formulation was created and tested against the standard, in-house, acetone-based ink recipe.
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation

Sentencas: Poly(N-VinylPyrrolidone) (PVP) was selected as a suitable dispersant and Poly(Vinyl Alcohol) (PVA) as the binder and a range of chain lengths and quantities was tested.
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation

Sentencas: The PVA content was adjusted to optimise adhesion of the two layers, as some delamination was observed with the first attempt.
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation

Sentencas: Various PVP chain lengths and quantities were tested to determine the effect on ink dispersion, and hence cathode structure and porosity.
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation

Sentencas: The electrical performance was tested and found to be favourably comparable with the in-house recipe, giving a marginally higher peak power density of 0.48 W/cm(2).
Titulo: A novel water-based cathode ink formulation
